definition: to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: " She gestured to a middle-aged couple holding hands. "Look at them.
sentences.chinese: 她指着一對手牽手的中年夫婦，“看看他們。

sentences.english: Heartbeat by heartbeat, hand by hand, we'll build a new era.
sentences.chinese: 心連心，手牽手，我們一定能夠創造新的時代。

sentences.english: The prince apparently held hands with his fiancée as they walked slowly to the island where Princess Diana was laid to rest.
sentences.chinese: 王子與凱特手牽手，慢慢來到黛安娜王妃長眠的小島。

sentences.english: Be able to get back at the right hand fork again?
sentences.chinese: 能找回那個分岔口再次牽手嗎？

sentences.english: Sloan: Last I heard you were at hand holding foot rubs and lots of late-night gab sessions.
sentences.chinese: 最新的消息是，你和她手牽手和多次促膝夜談。

sentences.english: Here are lovers in hand with the travel destination.
sentences.chinese: 這裏更是情侶們牽手同遊的勝地。

sentences.english: Going hand-in-hand may not only be asign of a sturdy relationship but may also have healthbenefits。
sentences.chinese: 除了作爲穩定關係的標誌，牽手走還有益健康。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I want to ascend Mt. Taishan with you, hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，好想和你牽手，登臨泰山。

sentences.english: Today, the history enables the two countries with ancient civilizations to join hands for greater prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 如今，歷史再次讓兩個文明古國聯袂牽手，再創輝煌。
但他們會瘋狂地牽手麼？

sentences.english: West Lake took hold of the hands of the blue sea. Monkey Lele staged a shinning debut in Cannes, France.
sentences.chinese: 西子湖牽手蔚藍海岸，美猴樂樂閃亮登場法國戛納。

sentences.english: There is enough room for us to form a large circle, holding hands together.
sentences.chinese: 有絕對足夠的空間讓我們圍成一個大圈，相互手牽手。

sentences.english: They went out hand in hand.
Hand in hand they skip down the beach.
sentences.chinese: 她們互相牽手歡快地來到了海灘邊。

sentences.english: I met you, how I wish, one hand is a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 締遇見了你，我多希望，一牽手便是一輩子。

sentences.english: Jimmy and Jammy get hitched at last!
sentences.chinese: 吉米和嘉美終於幸福牽手。

definition: to get to know each other/acquaintance
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
